FuncDef:
The destination-group command associates a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.
The undo destination-group command deletes a destination group that is associated. The destination-group command associates a destination group to which the data sampled is sent. The undo destination-group command deletes a destination group that is associated. By default, no destination group is associated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters. The value is the name of an existing Destination-group.

ExtraInfo: To enable a destination group that is created in the Telemetry view to take effect, run the destination-group command in the Subscription view to associate it.
